name: easy-price-calculator
author: Frank Ortiz

sections.description:
Add a visual sliders to the product, and run a formule to calculate the price. You can use aritmetic operators and 2 tags. If you need improve or add new functionalities/variables/preview/fields, just contact me Frank Ortiz

Available fields

  • product-id
  • formule
  • slider-1
  • slider-2
  • result-calculate
  • currency-symbol
  • enable

Usage

Navigate to the plugin documentation if you need more information on how to use this plugin.

Support

Find help in our support plaftorm for this plugin.
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin
  2. Find the easy-price-calculator plugin by Frank Ortiz and click Install now
  3. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of product-support-now.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Enjoy

Usage

Go to the plugin’s documentation for information on how to use it.
sections.faq:
No limitation for the Free version

The free version of the easy-price-calculator is not limited.

What if I need some speficial customization?

Just contact me and we can discuss about any new great feature.

Usage

Go to the plugin’s documentation if you need more information on how to use this plugin.

Support

Find help on our support plaftorm for this plugin.
